name: Howling Escape
description:
Escape from the forest, and keep away the crawling vines. Also, you're a wolf.

Space to jump.

Tree/Bush sprite: https://opengameart.org/content/2d-lost-garden-tileset-transition-to-jetrels-woo...

Vine sprites: https://opengameart.org/content/vine-with-thorns

Wolf sprites by Stephen "Redshrike" Challener and William.Thompsonj: https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-wolf-animation
